title: Ill Met in Lankhmar
description: They are the two greatest heroes ever to walk the World of Fafhrd, the giant barbarian warrior from the Cold Waste; and the Gray Mouser, novice wizard, master thief, and swordsman unparalleled. In this one volume, fantasy legend Fritz Leiber takes readers through the first two books of the classic sword-and-sorcery Swords and Deviltry and Swords Against Death. "Solid entertainment."--Kirkus Reviews.
author: Fritz Leiber
